actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend titles I, X, XIV, and XVI of the Social Security Act so as to permit Federal reimbursement to States for two-party payments under the programs of aid or assistance for the aged, the blind, and the disabled in the same way as is presently permitted under the program of aid to families with dependent children.

summary.text: Permits Federal reimbursement to States for two-party payments under the programs of aid or assistance for the aged, the blind, and the disabled in the same manner as is presently permitted under the program of aid to families with dependent children under the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles I, X, XIV, and XVI of the Social Security Act so as to permit Federal reimbursement to States for two-party payments under the programs of aid or assistance for the aged, the blind, and the disabled in the same way as is presently permitted under the program of aid to families with dependent children.
